message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. How about $105?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've already given you a discount from my initial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $110, so I'm offering it to you for $107.50.
